title: Indian Government’s Injustice to IPKF in India’s Vietnam
content: – by Shenali Waduge – The arrival of over 70,000 Indian Peace Keeping Force troops to Sri Lanka followed the signing of the Indo-Lanka Peace Accord on 29 July 1987.
